full_text: IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR: Jeffery DATE: 03/07/05 TIME: 10:12 P.M. M: Sofia OF: PHONE/MOBILE: 310 463 5759 TELEPHONED PLEASE CALL CAME TO SEE YOU WILL CALL AGAIN WANTS TO SEE YOU RUSH RETURNED YOUR CALL SPECIAL ATTENTION MESSAGE: That she returned your call SIGNED: IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR: Jeffery DATE: 3/28/05 TIME: 12:40 P.M. M: Laurie Lamerson OF: PHONE/MOBILE: 1917 742 8892 TELEPHONED PLEASE CALL CAME TO SEE YOU WILL CALL AGAIN WANTS TO SEE YOU RUSH RETURNED YOUR CALL SPECIAL ATTENTION MESSAGE: Please call her back, she would like to speak with you SIGNED: IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR: Jeffery DATE: 03/01/05 TIME: 10:11 A.M. M: Cecilia OF: PHONE/MOBILE: TELEPHONED PLEASE CALL CAME TO SEE YOU WILL CALL AGAIN WANTS TO SEE YOU RUSH RETURNED YOUR CALL SPECIAL ATTENTION MESSAGE: She has Mr. Locke on the phone SIGNED: 07 26/17 Page 39 of 124 IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR: Jeffery DATE: 03/01/85 TIME: 10:08 P.M. M: Eva OF: PHONE/MOBILE: TELEPHONED PLEASE CALL CAME TO SEE YOU WILL CALL AGAIN WANTS TO SEE YOU RUSH RETURNED YOUR CALL SPECIAL ATTENTION MESSAGE: That she called Public Records Request No.: 17-295 DOJ-OGR-00031760

additional_notes: The document appears to be a scanned copy of a page from a notebook containing message slips. The page is dated 07/26/17 and is page 39 of 124. The messages are from 2005, indicating the notebook may have been used for storing historical or archived messages.
